item.title: Force Multiplier
item.description: Man is a tool-using animal. Without tools he is nothing, with tools he is all.” — Thomas Carlyle , essayist and historian Force multiplication is a concept taken from Military Science , where a tool is used to help amplify your initial effort. Think hammering in a nail with your hand vs. using a hammer. What can you multiple? Physical force, thought, or attention. https://personalmba.com/force-multiplier/ What are common force multipliers?
